title: Tarea principal: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
description: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
intro: In breaking down the task of planning a weekend trip to Medellín, Colombia, I have identified four functional areas. These areas cover the essential aspects of travel planning, ensuring a comprehensive and well-structured approach to creating a detailed travel plan.

subtasks.title: Destination Research
subtasks.description: Researching and selecting the destination, Medellín, Colombia, for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of attractions, accommodations, and activities in Medellín.
responsibilities: Identify popular tourist attractions in Medellín.
Research accommodation options in different areas of the city.
Compile a list of recommended activities and dining options.

subtasks.title: Research Popular Tourist Attractions
subtasks.description: Identify and list popular tourist attractions in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of popular tourist attractions in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Explore Accommodation Options
subtasks.description: Research accommodation options in different areas of Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended accommodations in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Compile List of Activities and Dining Options
subtasks.description: Gather information on activities and dining options in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended activities and dining options in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Travel Logistics
subtasks.description: Handling all travel logistics, including transportation and accommodation arrangements.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed itinerary with transportation and accommodation details.
responsibilities: Book flights or other transportation to and from Medellín.
Reserve accommodation for the weekend stay.
Arrange for transportation within Medellín, such as car rental or public transportation.

subtasks.title: Book Flights to Medellín
subtasks.description: Book round-trip flights to Medellín for the weekend stay.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed flight tickets to and from Medellín.

subtasks.title: Reserve Accommodation in Medellín
subtasks.description: Reserve a hotel or Airbnb for the weekend stay in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of accommodation booking in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Arrange Transportation in Medellín
subtasks.description: Plan for transportation within Medellín, such as car rental or public transportation.

subtasks.title: Budget Planning
subtasks.description: Planning and managing the budget for the weekend trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: A budget breakdown including expenses for transportation, accommodation, activities, and meals.
responsibilities: Estimate costs for flights, accommodation, and transportation.
Research and allocate a budget for activities and dining.
Identify potential areas for cost-saving without compromising the quality of the trip.

subtasks.title: Research Transportation Options
subtasks.description: Research and estimate costs for flights or other transportation options to Medellín.

subtasks.title: Explore Accommodation Choices
subtasks.description: Research and allocate a budget for accommodation options in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Plan Activities and Dining
subtasks.description: Allocate a budget for activities and dining during the weekend trip in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Budget breakdown for activities and meals.

subtasks.title: Itinerary Creation
subtasks.description: Creating a detailed itinerary outlining the activities and schedule for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A day-by-day itinerary with planned activities, timings, and locations.
responsibilities: Organize the sequence of activities and sightseeing spots.
Allocate time for travel between locations.
Include free time for relaxation or spontaneous exploration.

subtasks.title: Research Activities and Attractions
subtasks.description: Research and identify popular activities and attractions in Medellín for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended activities and attractions.

subtasks.title: Create Day-by-Day Itinerary
subtasks.description: Organize the selected activities and attractions into a detailed day-by-day itinerary with timings and locations.

subtasks.title: Allocate Travel Time
subtasks.description: Allocate sufficient time for travel between locations in the itinerary.
subtasks.expected_output: Travel time slots included in the itinerary.

subtasks.title: Include Free Time
subtasks.description: Allocate free time for relaxation or spontaneous exploration in the itinerary.
subtasks.expected_output: Free time slots included in the itinerary.
